It is respectfully announced, that the medical advisers of

HI A D A

having represented lo the Management the impossibility of this
distinguished Singer appearing To-Right, without incurring
considerable risk, {notwithstanding
the utmost desire she km
manifested so to do) the Lessee has not hesitated a moment,
despite the heavy loss already incurred hy the postponement,
and at the same time to prevent any further disappointment to

the Public, to defer the second representation of

CHANTRI

My dear

u
It is impossible to express the regret I feel for the
" inconvenience to which I have unavoidably subjected you,
•« as well as J or any disappointment to the Public by wham
*£ hare heen so generously received.
"I am, however, happy to announce to you, my gradual
"recovery, and that J shall be quite prepared to appear
•• on Friday next.
